attr.title: Will You Snail
attr.desc:
A unique platformer where an evil AI predicts your movement. Dodge AI-spawned traps, solve optional puzzles and uncover the dark secrets of the simulation. 
A lot of levels in Will You Snail are relatively empty by default. The challenge comes from the interactions with the evil AI. You will jump, run, dodge and die. This game is precise, fast-paced and challenging. (Stay cool, you can change the difficulty at any time.)
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam. Use the Steam console to download the right version of the game: download_depot 1115050 1115051 8411373960038250729. Place all the files from /depot_1115051 into ports/willyousnail/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1115050/Will_You_Snail/).
Use download_depot 1115050 1115051 8411373960038250729 with Steam Console to download the game and add the data to willyousnail/assets.
